channel.title: yolov3 on Technical Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in yolov3 on Technical Ramblings

item.title: “Don’t touch your face” - Neural Network will warn you
item.description: A few days back, Keras creator, Francois Chollet tweeted A Keras/TF.js challenge: make a model that processes a webcam feed and detects when someone touches their face (triggering a loud beep).“ The very next day, I tried the Keras yolov3 model available in the Github. It was trained on the coco80 dataset and could detect person but not the face touch. V1 Training The original Keras implementation lacked documentation to train fromscratch or transfer learning.
